name: MadandLexSpreadAbundance
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Madeleine Duprez & Lexy Reynolds' daily thoughts, findings, and encouragements to stay positive and set your day on the right note. Perfect for the morning, or if you're feeling uncentered to get balanced again. Authentic material recorded daily, so may contain some occasional clowning.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
